text: The Queen of Spades () is a 1916 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yakov Protazanov. It stars Ivan Mosjoukine, Vera Orlova, and Yelizaveta Shebueva. The movie is an adaptation of the 1834 Aleksandr Pushkin short story of the same name. ==Actors== * Ivan Mosjoukine as Hermann * Vera Orlova as Lizaveta Ivanovna * Yelizaveta Shebueva as Countess Anna Fedotovna as an old woman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian horror movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1916 drama movies Category:1910s horror movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: The Queen of Spades (1916 movie)
